name: The Grass is Greener
description:
Two worlds and too much trash. 

These planets are pulled along in parallel but some unknown force keeps them unaligned.

Each world is overrun by trash and they dislike each other for some long forgotten reason. So each launches their garbage at the other in shuttles via railgun.

A successful hit grants you positive points and a miss or hitting a shield results in negative points.

The player with the highest net score at the end wins.

Player 1 Controls
Shoot: D
Shield: A

Player 2 Controls
Shoot: J
Shield: L

This game was made on the last day of Winnipeg Game Jam. Audio and the win screen were added afterwards.
